name: Slimey (Kelgors)
description:
Controls MoveArrows AA or Q key BZ or W key StartEnter key SelectSpace bar
Description

  After a long sleep, Slimey woke up but no one was expecting her. Guide her through multiple levels to find someone who can enlighten you.

  The game is made with gbdk-2020 v4.0.5, Tiled v1.3.0 and Aseprite v1.2.30.


Features
  • Wall-Jump
  • Slipping wall
  • Switches & Doors
  • Lasers (wip)
  • 4 levels (wip)
  • Collectables

Changelog
  • 2022-01-04: Change Laboratory tileset, add pause screen
  • 2022-01-02: End portal, main menu screen, change font
  • 2022-01-01: Happy new year ! Doors, switches, change level
  • 2021-12-31: First publication to itch.io
  • 2021-12-18: Starting development
